p: Influenza infection was confirmed in 43 of the 52 individuals (82%) subjected to the influenza challenge; 33 subjects developed symptoms, including 19 with ILI (ILI flu+). An additional 3 subjects were challenged with influenza and became symptomatic, but had no evidence of influenza infection. There were 3 other challenged individuals that remained asymptomatic, with no evidence of influenza.
